Blog.post: something just doesnt make sense...i cant place my finger on it but for some reason the world actually seems happy. which i suppose is a good thing, but then nothing ever stays happy, nothing ever ends good, so eventually all this happy stuff will leave and we'll be left with the rest of the crap. eh..oh well, ive lived a lifetime of that crap whats a little more? sorry, bringing down the happiness, wanna make that last as long as possible!

You let me drift away Watching from afar You stand there Waiting for me to dissapear You make no movement No handmotion of goodbye You just let me drift away Ill make one last gesture Begging for forgivenss Just saying goodbye I salute you You've let me drift away

Hope is slowly puring out Faith, will too eventually leave While darkness comes creeping quickly And love drains out just as fast Loneliness is settling in Inspiration will soon give out And evil will win All happiness must go, Eventually

ya know, little kids can really boost your self esteem. really, its like they look up to you so they always wanna be aournd you and they want to sit next to you and if you ask them how you look they tell you you look absolutly beautiful and they wanna do everything you do and its just sooo cool! especially when you feel really down about yourself and the world they help you realize taht there really are good things in life and you sort of notice things more when you're around them. i odnt know, at least thats how i feel when im hanging iwht my little cousin.

ok, new (and well, i guess first,) obseesion! ready for it....TINKERBELL!!! she is just sooo awesome and you can find her stuff everywhere! im on vaca in arizona and so far this is what ive gotten with her on it... a jacket, a blanket, a key chain, 2 shirts, paper(pink, a really awesome color), a postcard, 1 necklace (well, they're not tink, but they're fairies and they're so close, its scary lol) i just absolutley lover her! my family here thinks ive gone nuts and im sure the people who rang the stuff up at hot topic think so too...lol

I have no idea who to tlak to about anything at the moment...i was just told that the one person i dotn like is the one person who deosnt hate me. He told me that most of my friends despise me and looking back, maybe i do see of a few hints of this. I guess i jsut wanted things to be good and all right so i just ignored what was really happeneing and i cant believe this...i actually thought people liked me. Who do you turn to when all hope is lost? when the person who doesnt hate you is the one you hate? when the people who you thought you knew and trusted secretly or obviously never really like you to being with? who do you turn to when you're all alone? i guess this blog is my only salvation left...
